Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters. US X Factor. The Price Of Beauty star took to her Twitter account this week to dismiss a recent rumour that she could join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of his upcoming Fox competition. Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) she wrote. Jessica Simpson is the latest in a string of celebrities to be linked to the show. Other names that have been mentioned as possible judges include Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and UK X Factor judge Cheryl Cole

Vint Cerf said Eric Schmidt , 55, had been chief executive for 10 years-" a nice round number"- and Page, now 37, was ready to lead the company into the future. Larry and Sergey Brin are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said." He was the only guy that stood up to them- these were two young, smart, incredibly brilliant guys who literally had just dropped their PhDs to go start this company.

Page, now 37 and graying. Although Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a startup. Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products. Page is worth$ 15 billion, but he remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.
